effect.text: Trade 1 of the Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards in your hand for 1 of the Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards from your deck. Show both cards to your opponent. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cost.description: Trade a Basic Pokemon or Evolution card from hand

requirements.description: Must have at least one Basic Pokemon or Evolution card in hand

tips: Use to convert late-game Basic Pokemon into evolution cards
Trade away evolution cards you can't use for Basics you can play immediately
Most effective in decks running multiple evolution lines
In early game, trade evolutions for Basics to establish your board
In late game, trade Basics for evolutions to complete your setup

rulings.ruling: You must have at least one Basic Pokemon or Evolution card in your hand to use Pokemon Trader
You can search for any Basic Pokemon or Evolution card in your deck (Stage 1 or Stage 2)
You must show both the card you're trading away and the card you're searching for to your opponent
The card you trade away goes to your deck, and you shuffle your deck afterward
You cannot use Pokemon Trader to search for Trainer or Energy cards
If you don't have the type of Pokemon card you want in your deck, you must still trade and show your deck to prove it
You cannot choose not to search after trading away a Pokemon
Energy cards attached to Pokemon in hand stay in hand (you're trading the card only)
Pokemon Trader can search for or trade away any Basic Pokemon, including evolved forms printed as Basics (like Baby Pokemon in later sets)
You must shuffle your deck even if you don't find what you're looking for
